RelatedSentence: NEW DELHI : After its disastrous performance , senior Congress leaders are gunning for Dentsu , the Japanese communication agency which handled the party 's poll advertising account .
Congress hired Dentsu for nearly Rs 600 crore .
But the Congress campaign failed to match the BJP ad blitz , which was handled by Piyush Pandey , Prasoon Joshi and Sam Balsara .

A0: Piyush Pandey , Prasoon Joshi and Sam Balsara
RelatedSentence: They not only charged a premium for the creatives , but they also released ads at an abnormally high premium in connivance with various media houses , a senior Congress leader alleged .

A0: Piyush Pandey , Prasoon Joshi and Sam Balsara

A Dentsu India spokesperson countered the charge .

A0: Piyush Pandey , Prasoon Joshi and Sam Balsara
RelatedSentence: All the financial negotiations were in line with the services we had committed to offer via a rigorous and transparent process , and agreed to before the commencement of the campaign .

Apart from Dentsu India , there was another agency hired by Congress for ad releases .
A senior Congress leader also alleged that Dentsu India executive chairman Rohit Ohri had a heated argument with Congress leader Ajay Maken over the same issue .
Subsequently , all Dentsu employees in India received an email , which forbade them from talking to the media .
